data.message:
Hey Em I use to have mad respect for you.  Now you of all ppl couldn't believe my eyes.  I now see you do nothing but suck Mark Zuckerberg dick.  Possibly get it in your ass by him.  

Maybe even his fist,  maybe even his fist. 
Thought you were cumming. But really was only taking a piss. . 

Talk shit about Trump. 
Now we the ppl just took a huge dump. 

You rap about maggots and faggots. 
Look in the mirror you will see the biggest faggot is near. 

You rap about pills, fuck bro take a chill.  
Go lay down take a bottle of pills.  

Maybe it will make it easier for you to realize your just a washed up old faggot.  That still paying his ex wife's bills. 

 Thought you were a bigger man after rapping  about Stan.  .

Now I know Stan was your man.  But Damn why name him Stan.   

We all know you met him in the park. 
And his name is Mark.  

He whipped it out you on your knees.  
With disbelief all you could spout is oh geez.  No no Mark Zuckerberg  please.  

Haha hit me up sometime.  We can spit more lines how your foggot on your knees. 
Carter Black, Christie Sailors Ingram, Emmy Johns, Jeff Learjet hahaha.

replies.message:
I just put  few lines together.  In memory of a fool I thought I once knew.  
 I see now just a washed up tool.

Man I loved Eminem as a Teen. Now he sounds like a douche bag, like Snoop sounding like an old washed up rapper trying to stay current. Say what you want about Trump, but the NFL, polictical stuff, BLM that shot was happening when Obama was President. Im not American either just an outsider looking in from, another part of the world.
#therestoftheworldiswatchingAmerica
Lol i dont like trump. But this was a good rap. Good job uncle mitch funny asf
